CustomField.description: System-generated, using individual pieces of the address record. This field contains the formatted address, which can be used for mailing purposes.
CustomField.formula: Street__c & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Street__c)), ', ', '') & City__c & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(City__c)), ', ', '') & State__c & ' ' & PostalCode__c & ' ' & Country__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: System-generated, using individual pieces of the address record. This field contains the formatted address, which can be used for mailing purposes.
CustomField.label: Full address
